content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

```plain text
7:30 | Wake Up
7:30 - 8:00 | (late) morning routine
8:00 - 10:00 | Fix loading screen on blog; also incorporate task list snapshots on timeblocks page
10:00 - 11:00  | Look into implementing sleep diary
11:00 - 15:00 | Experiment with VSCode Live Share for Dialect
15:00 - 19:00 | Compile AdminControl (add vue-lion) and set it up on my MacBook
19:00 - 21:00 | Look into Y Combinator Startup School; create completion timeline
21:00 - 22:00 | Write down concrete plans for getting more exercise, eating healthier & schedule a time for solitude walking every day
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v2

Woke up late

```plain text
10:15 | Wake Up
10:15 - 10:30 | Call with Kevin X
10:30 - 12:00 | Fix loading screen on blog; also incorporate task list snapshots on timeblocks page
12:00 - 15:00 | Experiment with VSCode Live Share for Dialect
15:00 - 19:00 | Compile AdminControl (add vue-lion) and set it up on my MacBook
19:00 - 21:00 | Look into Y Combinator Startup School; create completion timeline
21:00 - 22:00 | Write down concrete plans for getting more exercise, eating healthier & schedule a time for solitude walking every day
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v3

Took a nap because I felt too tired to work (although I think I need to learn how to stay awake since naps seem to ruin my sleep schedule)

```plain text
10:15 | Wake Up
10:15 - 10:30 | Call with Kevin X
10:30 - 12:00 | Fix loading screen on blog; also incorporate task list snapshots on timeblocks page
12:00 - 14:00 | Experiment with VSCode Live Share for Dialect
14:00 - 17:00 | Nap
17:00 - 18:20 | Call with Kevin X about Dialect
18:20 - 18:40 | Writing a short essay for something
18:40 - 21:00 | Finish vue-lion; Compile AdminControl
21:00 - 22:00 | Write down concrete plans for getting more exercise, eating healthier & schedule a time for solitude walking every day
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v4

Helped with debugging some Dialect stuff

```plain text
10:15 | Wake Up
10:15 - 10:30 | Call with Kevin X
10:30 - 12:00 | Fix loading screen on blog; also incorporate task list snapshots on timeblocks page
12:00 - 14:00 | Experiment with VSCode Live Share for Dialect
14:00 - 17:00 | Nap
17:00 - 18:20 | Call with Kevin X about Dialect
18:20 - 18:40 | Writing a short essay for something
18:40 - 21:00 | Finish vue-lion; Compile AdminControl
21:00 - 22:00 | Write down concrete plans for getting more exercise, eating healthier & schedule a time for solitude walking every day
22:00 - 23:00
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### Notes

I need to start using Toggl again; maybe making a Toggl integration would motivate me more?

Didnâ€™t end up finishing AdminControl (icons are broken), will try completing tomorrow

Self-rule: every time I stick to a v1 timeblock, I get to buy outside food (otherwise, not allowed to eat out)

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Fill out Sleep Log; Make Bed; Place Kindle on Pillow; Brush Teeth; 
7:15 - 7:30 | Breakfast
7:30 - 7:45 | Solitude walk outside the block
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Fill out Sleep Log; Bedtime
```
